channel.title: [PI] HOW TO CHANGE THE AMOUNT OF SPECIAL ATTACk WEAPONS USE? [PI]
channel.description: will rep you ++ if you help me with this problem. It is probably a simple fix and i cant think right now. So please help. thanks in advance =]

item.title: [PI] HOW TO CHANGE THE AMOUNT OF SPECIAL ATTACk WEAPONS USE? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Marine5287 Marine5287
item.description:
@Marine5287 wrote:

Go in ItemAssistant.java and search for

and below it should tell you what weapon it is. For example

Within the code of the weapon there’s a code that looks like this

If you want the special attack to take off half of the special attack bar at once, look at a weapon that does do that and take that number, and

do the same thing if you want it to take away 1/4 of the bar.

Read full topic
